= How to contribute and make this project grow ? =

 * Use it!

 * Recommend this on Google by pressing the red 'G+1' button

 * If you want to contribute, fix and add code: send me an email by clicking on my account name in 'member', click the 3 dots and input the catchpa, and ask me to include you in the member list.
